SELECT item_no, item_name, img_name, amount, price, regdate, category FROM ( SELECT item_no, item_name, img_name, amount, price, regdate, category, (@row_number:=@row_number + 1) AS row_num FROM item CROSS JOIN (SELECT @row_number := 0) AS rn ORDER BY regdate DESC ) AS ranked ORDER BY regdate DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{cntPerPage}
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET item_name = #{item_name}, img_name = #{img_name}, amount = #{amount}, content = #{content}, price = #{price}, category = #{category}, status = #{status}, regdate = NOW() -- 현재 시간으로 등록일 업데이트 WHERE item_no = #{item_no}
